name: Lights Out - DDG2022
description:
Lights Out is a short little puzzle game. The game is missing UI, but the controls are WASD to move and E to interact.

To complete a level, turn off all the major energy consumers in each house.

The lights can be switched off by hitting interact on their corresponding switch. Some switches control multiple lights, and some lights are controlled by multiple switches. The computer requires that the light in the room is turned off, and the radiator requires you to press interact 5 times.

There are only 5 levels in total, and they're obviously not very polished, but they do work (ish).

No start/end screen or settings unfortunately.

Testing hotkeys: R to restart game, P to go to previous level and N to next level (if it exists).
